1.「やる気 出ないわー。| お前の顔を彫るって 約束はしたんだけどー。| やる気が: I'm so unmotivated. I promised to carve your|face. I just can't get motivated.

2.<cs_pchero>は マカイ・マカロンの箱を|そっと 差し出した。: <cs_pchero> gently offered a box of Makai|Macarons.

4.「スライムのように 愛らしいフォルム！| 魔界で 唯一無二の ふわサク感！| 優:
As adorable as Slime! The one and only|fluffiness in Demon World! The sweetness of|the cake will make even the Walking Corpse|
|weep...

5.「ゼクレス王家も御用達 マカイ・マカロン！| こいつを ワシに くれるってのか！: Makai Macarons! The royal family of Zechres!|You're giving it to me?

6.「あ…甘い物とか| べつに 好きじゃないけど……| もらっといてやる！: Oh...I don't like sweets or anything,|but...I'll take it!

7.モヒペンコは <cs_pchero>から|マカイ・マカロンを いそいそと 受け取: Mohipenko was eagerly accepting Makai Macarons|from <cs_pchero>.

9.「フンっ！| なかなか やるじゃない！: Hmph! You're pretty good at that!

10.「……仕方ねえなー。| あんだけ硬い 幻獣のツノも 初めてだったし。| お前の顔: I don't know... I can't help it. I've never|seen such a hard Beast's Horn before. I'm|gonna carve your face!

11.「まあ…… それでも | ここに並ぶ ４人の大魔王に比べたら| まだまだ ひよっ: Well... even so, I'm still a novice compared|to the four Great Demon Kings lined up here!

12.「特に ネロドスなんか 本当にいい男だったぜ。| １０００年前に 死んじまったが: Especially Nerodos, who died a thousand years|ago. You're not even close to Nerodos.

14.「この 大ウソつきめ！| ちょっとばかし強いからって お前ごときが| 不死の魔王: You big liar! How can you win against the|Immortal Demon King Nerodos just because|you're a little stronger than him!

15.「ネロドスの顔を彫ったのは ワシだ。 | そして ワシは 自分の作品から そのモ: It was I who carved Nerodos' face. And I can|create visions of the model's past from my|work!

16.「こいつは 本物の ネロドスとちがって | 不死のチカラこそないが 本物なみに: Unlike the real Nerodos, this one does not|have immortality, but it is as strong as the|real thing.

17.「お前が ネロドスに勝てるほど| 強いというなら 証明してみせろ！| そうすりゃ: If you're strong enough to beat Nerodos, prove|it! Then I'll carve your face on it!
